name: Crow hunting Adventure
description:
Suppose you are hired by an airport regulatory department as a crow hunter. You are on mission to clear the area from crows as they are creating problems during flight take off and landing i.e. crow collide with airplanes or distract pilots. Forest crow hunting lets you shoot out the crows at real time in the most adventuring environment. You are equipped with powerful sniper gun take the aim and shoot right on the spot. On completing missions you will be given assassin shooter title. Don’t let crows to escape from your sniper gun bullet. You have limited time so hold your breath and show your shooting skills and let the crows die in blackout.
How to Play:
- Tap on fire to shoot located at right bottom of your apple mobile.
- Tap on zoom present just above fire button right bottom of your device to take a close look at crows.
- 6 thrilling and challenging missions.
- choose the level to play, hunt all to unlock next
- Navigate screen on swiping on left of your phone.
- Kill crows to accomplish objectives.
- Keep any eye on time.
Features:
- top free offline jungle shooting and hunting game.
- Excellent sniper physics and controls implemented.
- Supports all devices.
- realistic 3d graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing killing effects.
- brutal Action now on your smart phones.
- User friendly GUI and controls.
- real adventuring forest Environment looks like adventure movies.
- Support for hd devices.
- Game with Good quality sound effects.
- Efficient weapon controls & movement.
- Best downloading gun shoot game in gaming world
